hero.title: Confidence
hero.tagline: A fully organic silica powder born from Mother Vegetables
hero.catch2: Nurtures both your skin and the Earth
hero.body:
“Mother Vegetables Confidence” was born from Mother Vegetables.
It gently nurtures your skin while helping restore the environment,
a one-of-a-kind skincare in the world.

It grows your beauty and the future of our planet at the same time.
This new form of skincare has now arrived.

The gentleness that protects your skin also becomes kindness to the Earth.
And it all begins with your conscious choice.
